name: Asus 21 Inch Curved Monitor
details: The Pixel 3 XL has identical cameras, dual front-facing speakers, Snapdragon 845 chipset, and 4GB of RAM as the fits-in-one-hand Google Pixel 3. But the XL version has the edge on its smaller sibling with a bigger 6.3-inch bezel-reduced OLED screen and higher-capacity 3,430mAh battery

review.description:
Great product ! This is the best
                                        coffee I've tasted in a while. Definitely recommended if you're a coffee
                                        lover.
